attributes.action: Stop greed and end oppression and poverty
attributes.additional_details: For to long the gap between the rich and poor has become dramatically increased and the oppression also. Unemployed has risen and could easily be tackled  instead of building imperialistic unnecessary high speed railways (gimmicks) the government should spend it on more directly, intervening and social problems rather then spending 30 billion on yet anouther imperialistic profiteering project that only benefits the 1%. We are living in a state of greed and corruption end it !!!
